OOC: Me watch star trek? since when? Heh but I did get the multi phase laser 
thingy from an ep or movie I was of star trek... However the photon torpedoe 
thing... everyone knows what they are so I used them.

Gemini 1 laughs as he opens fire on the two he did before with the multi 
phase laser cannon, however this time the beams did not strike the bots but 
were stopped by the shield. Vile notices this and growls as he turns to 
everyone.

Vile: "It seems as though these people will not submit willingly to our help. 
In that case... open fire on that base with everything!"

With that said all over the ship missile pods rise from within as it turns 
towards the trainers base. Vile smirks as this happens and types in a few 
commands at his console causing the bottom of the ship to open up and a 
massive cannon to lower. Without another word the Violator opens fire on the 
trainer base with three shots from each megacannon, 6 photon torpedoes, 8 
laser blasts, and six concussion missiles. As this happens the tip of the 
massive cannon that lowered out of the Violator begins to glow and crackle 
with energy as it begins to charge.

Outside the trainers base Cyanide notices the mass of firepower sent at the 
base and laughs evily to himself as the acid rain begins to stop.

Cyanide: "So they're the enemy now..."

Cyanide grins as a loud hum is heard from the sky before four large beams of 
energized acid are also sent at the trainer base.
IN another time... 

--part1_55.1676942f.284b86d7_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
